rownames(sum_lmer_mean_ten_dvars$coefficients)<-c( "Intercept", "0.2 scan", "0.4 scan", "0.6 scan", "0.8 scan", "FD mean", "Follow up scan", "THR >2.3 s", "THR >4.6 s", "DVARS mean")

theme_tufte_revised(base_size = 30, base_family = "sans")+scale_color_manual(labels = c("Head motion max", "Head motion mean"), values = c("#5e3c99",  "#e66101"), name="")+
theme(legend.position = "bottom")+theme(axis.title.x = element_text(size=25, hjust=0.5))+annotate(geom="text", label= "R?c=0.75, R?m= 0.23", x=1.5 , y=5.5, color="#5e3c99",size=5)+
annotate(geom="text", label= "R?c=0.79, R?m= 0.28", x=1.5, y=5, color= "#e66101", size=5)+theme(axis.title.y = element_text(size=23, hjust=0.5, vjust=0.3))+xlim(-1,2)
